name: Youtube - hide Shorts from Subscriptions
description: Since content creators are now embracing Shorts, your Subscriptions might be overloaded with them. This style just hides them all. You might be surprised by how much will be removed.
additional_info: It uses the attribute is-shorts to identify and hide the element. It defaults to the Subscriptions page, but ou may want to change the url to be domain wide, on youtube.com.
